## blockRendering.MarkerSvg.showWithNext\_() method

Position and display the marker for a next connection. This is a horizontal line.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript

```

|  curNode | [ASTNode](./blockly.astnode.md) | The node to draw the marker for. |
